title: Grass Appearance
description: Set the grass color or color map used during rendering. Biomes without this component will have default grass appearance.

color.title: Color
color.description: RGB color of grass, or a Grass Color Map object.

color_map.title: Color Map
color_map.description: Color map from textures/colormap to determine color of grass.

grass_is_shaded.title: Grass Is Shaded
grass_is_shaded.description: Adds a shading effect to the grass as if there was a roof.
